item.title: Now that’s kinda creepy…
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Ballmer Babies Banned From iPods and Google "In a recent Fortune interview with Steve Ballmer, the newer kinder Microsoft CEO is not only ready to take on the videogaming, search, music download and mobile markets - but he's also laying down the law in his own house. Steve says that his kids are not allowed to use Google or have an iPod." (Courtesy of Slashdot) - Subscribe to Slashdot
